column5: just wondering if anyone knows of any online resources to free crown land maps?  I like to do a lot of camping during the summer but I find park fee's tend to add up.  I know there is lots of great crown land out there, but my searches for maps online have offered little direction.
I have often wondered this myself and am interested in the responses. I have never researched it at all....I just get lazy and go to a cottage
Here.. go anywhere you want in Ontario.  Zooming in and once you get small enough it will switch to more detail. Shows crown/patent land/etc.  http://crownlanduseatlas.mnr.gov.on.ca/clupa.html
Ya that works great. I have used it a lot myself
that looks like its exactly what I'm looking for, a little slow for me, but its great!  thanks!
